column4: hi , my new wireless mouse does't work , can somebody help ??
turn it on, plug it in, boot the computer   (in that order)
Have you done that?
do you see anything about this mouse in the output of dmesg?  It's big, if you want to pastebin it that'd be great: paste.ubuntu.com
dmesg is a command you run in the terminal
http://paste.ubuntu.com/784809/
reading...
thanks
looks like it is being rapidly connected and disconnected over and over?
with the message "port 4 disabled by hub?"
yep I tried too many time
what USB hub is it talking about?
about connected and disconnected is for the old mouse that i had
for the new one I don't know if really works
hang on
I'm not sure
for what dude ??
what?
here's what you  need to do.  Turn the computer off, take the mouse out, boot the computer, log in, plug in the mouse, run dmesg, start googling the errors about the mouse you find in dmesg
The biggest problem is that your dmesg right now has 100's of entries of you plugging and unplugging the mouse
and apparently you have two different mouse's that you were doing this with
I'll do thanks for your time,
